[[Image:Scrabble 6x9.jpg|thumb|right|220px|Scrabble used to try to find the Question to the [[The Answer to Life, the Universe, and Everything|Ultimate Answer]], from [[The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy (TV series)|The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy]].]]
 
Due to its popularity and universal familiarity, Scrabble is referenced frequently in [[pop culture]]. In particular, the plotline of characters challenging a dubious word played by an opponent is a common occurrence.
